EmailTemplate.name: RMA Received
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Valued YETI Customer,
RMA [ ] received here at YETI Coolers. This email is to confirm receipt of your product. No further action is required from you at this time.
If you have any questions please contact yetireturns@yeticoolers.com, or call the YETI Outfitters at 512-394-9384 for assistance.
If your return was in regards to a refund, we will do our best to complete your refund within 7 business days of receiving your product. During peak season times it may take up to 15 business days.
Thank you for being a YETI customer.
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeticoolers.com yeticoolers.com
